item.title: I just couldn't.
item.description: Choices can be hard sometimes. It’s extremely hard to choose between two things you love dearly, but add in career pressure to the mix and you can understand how I felt today.

item.title: Intro to microeconomics
item.description: A beginner’s guide to understanding microeconomics.
